title: Quilt, 1810–1815
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk, cotton batting for quilting
Technique: intaglio and block printed on plain weave; quilted using double lined diamond grid running stitch
dimensions:
H x W: 218 x 223.5 cm (7 ft. 1 13/16 in. x 7 ft. 4 in.)
Repeat H: 51 cm (20 1/16 in.)
description: Quilt showing two offset framed octagonal cartouches that enclose Italian rural scenes along with two smaller medallions. One of the small medallions has a young man and his dog and other a young woman feeding a sheep. The framed scenes are superimposed on a thick mass of flowers. Pattern is in purple with yellow added for background flowers. Backing fabric is a 3&1 twill striped silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Quilt, 1810–1815. Medium: cotton, silk, cotton batting for quilting
Technique: intaglio and block printed on plain weave; quilted using double lined diamond grid running stitch. 1975-44-1.
